entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High 10.
